algorithms.compression

Class CommonCompresses

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.compression.CommonCompresses
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Compresses
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HuffmanAlg, WordDictionary

    public abstract class CommonCompresses
extends java.lang.Object
implements Compresses
    The CommonCompresses class is abstracts. All who extend this class need to write the function compress and decompress
    Since:
    3.5.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bar Magnezi
